content:
within the Democratic Party

William M Tweed was local head of Democratic party, used his control and scheming to defraud the public of 200k in funds
	controlled many government buildings (eg police, firehouses, etc)

and when people went to town/state legislature to complain, their taxes were raised
when he went to local court, they found rock thru their window
when they went to report to police, police say "what rock?"

you can see how corrupt this system was and how they were just mooching off town member money
